pageContent: Objective: To evaluate prospectively the sexual function of patients undergoing cryosurgery as a primary radical treatment for localized prostate cancer, as the development of 17 G cryotherapy probes has improved the delivery of this treatment, but one of the side-effects of cryosurgery is the development of erectile dysfunction (ED).

metaData.source:
Couple-Based Psychosexual Support Following Prostate Cancer Surgery: Results of a Feasibility Pilot Randomized Control Trial
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27345218/
